title: Size and Color
content: A [big red|red big] apple. A [tiny green|green tiny] insect.

title: Opinion and Fact
content: A [lovely old|old lovely] lady. A [beautiful sunny|sunny beautiful] day.
explanationEnUs: Opinion (lovely, beautiful) comes before Fact (old, sunny).
explanationZhTw: 觀點 (lovely, beautiful) 在事實 (old, sunny) 之前。
explanationZhCn: 观点 (lovely, beautiful) 在事实 (old, sunny) 之前。

title: General Order
content: A [small old wooden|wooden old small] table. A [beautiful long black|black long beautiful] dress.
explanationEnUs: Order: Opinion -> Size -> Age -> Shape -> Color -> Origin -> Material -> Purpose.
explanationZhTw: 順序：觀點 -> 大小 -> 年齡 -> 形狀 -> 顏色 -> 產地 -> 材質 -> 用途。
explanationZhCn: 顺序：观点 -> 大小 -> age -> 形状 -> 颜色 -> 产地 -> 材质 -> 用途。

title: Multiple Adjectives
content: An [expensive Italian sports|Italian expensive sports] car. A [delicious large pepperoni|pepperoni large delicious] pizza.
explanationZhTw: 觀點 (expensive) -> 產地 (Italian) -> 用途/類型 (sports)。
explanationZhCn: 观点 (expensive) -> 产地 (Italian) -> 用途/类型 (sports)。

title: With Determiners
content: [Those three large|Three those large] books. [My two best|My best two] friends.
explanationZhTw: 限定詞 (Those, My) -> 數量 (three, two) -> 形容詞。
explanationZhCn: 限定词 (Those, My) -> 数量 (three, two) -> 形容词。
